texto: People and vehicle counting Video view with Spotlight anomaly detection Rules, events, alarms Map view with Smart PresenceTM Playback timeline with Smart PresenceTM Ava Aware mobile app (Android, iOS) Ava Aware Cloud Smart Search TM by event, object, similarity Open data platform Agile, scalable, secure, and easy to use, Ava Aware Cloud is a powerful video management system equipped with integrated machine learning capabilities accessible in the cloud or through the Ava Cloud Connector servers. Aware Cloud analyzes all the video feeds from all your cameras all the time and in real-time. It identifies objects and events and sends instant notifications and alarms based on rules and unusual activity detection to help your team focus on what really matters. Actionable intelligence made easy System 16-200 cameras per server Unlimited cameras per site Unlimited servers per site Device support Automatic device discovery Third-party IP cameras & encoders H.264 & H.265 video compression MJPEG video compression JPEG2000 video compression Streaming Dynamic stream selection Search Search by similarity Search by physical characteristics Search by event Search by image Search across all video Playback timeline with embedded thumbnails Smart PresenceTM Pervasive video analytics Unusual event detection People counting Vehicle counting Forensic investigation Intrusion detection Real-time notifications and alerts Spotlight Security and privacy protection HTTPS camera connectivity SRTP support AES video encryption Digital watermarking against tampering RTSP over TLS Client Intuitive and powerful interface HTML5 web client Saved views Interactive maps Active directory import Multi-camera export Configurable recording schedule Other features Email event notification Rule triggers Self-learning video analytics event configuration Ava Machine Learning server Analytics configuration Product family PID Product description Aware AWA-CLD-1Y 1-year subscription per camera to Ava Aware Cloud. Real-time video-analytics. Aware AWA-CLD-3Y 3-year subscription per camera to Ava Aware Cloud. Real-time video-analytics. Aware AWA-CLD-5Y 5-year subscription per camera to Ava Aware Cloud. Real-time video-analytics. Ordering information
texto_traducido: Conteo de personas y vehículos Vista de video con detección de anomalías de Spotlight Reglas, eventos, alarmas Vista de mapa con Smart PresenceTM Línea de tiempo de reproducción con Smart PresenceTM Aplicación móvil Ava Aware (Android, iOS) Ava Aware Cloud Smart Search TM por evento, objeto, similitud Plataforma de datos abierta Ágil Ava Aware Cloud, escalable, seguro y fácil de usar, es un potente sistema de gestión de vídeo equipado con capacidades integradas de aprendizaje automático accesibles en la nube o a través de los servidores Ava Cloud Connector. Aware Cloud analiza todas las transmisiones de video de todas sus cámaras en todo momento y en tiempo real. Identifica objetos y eventos y envía notificaciones y alarmas instantáneas basadas en reglas y detección de actividades inusuales para ayudar a su equipo a concentrarse en lo que realmente importa.
